title: Profile
subtitle: You can edit all your information here.

githubAccount.title: Github account
githubAccount.subtitle: To change your username or email, edit your account on Github, then resync your account.

notificationSettings.title: Notification
notificationSettings.subtitle: Enter a contact email. This email will be used by OnlyDust to send you notifications and to get in touch with you.

contact.title: Contact information
contact.subtitle: Please enter only your social networks handle (no links, no @ needed).

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.subtitle: Rank from most to least proficient.
